Notes.Text:
This update for ldns fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-1000231: Fixed a buffer overflow during token parsing (bsc#1068711).
- CVE-2017-1000232: Fixed a double-free vulnerability in str2host.c (bsc#1068709).
Notes.Title: Details
